attributes.action: require Dr Stephen Ladyman to renumber the A1(M) North of Hook Moor to M1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present numbering of the A1(M) North of Hook Moor where the M1 joins it causes much confusion to motorists. This can be improved by renumbering the A1(M) to M1 and renumbering junctions accordingly
